Returns: The media route chooser dialog fragment, must not be null.
onCreateChooserDialogFragment().Description: Called when the chooser dialog is being opened and it is time to create the fragment. Subclasses may override this method to create a customized fragment.

Returns: The default media route dialog factory, never null.
The media route controller dialog fragment, must not be null.
onCreateControllerDialogFragment().Description: Called when the controller dialog is being opened and it is time to create the fragment. Subclasses may override this method to create a customized fragment.

MediaRouteDialogFactory().Description: Creates a default media route dialog factory.

ClassDesc: The media route dialog factory is responsible for creating the media route chooser and controller dialogs as needed. The application can customize the dialogs by providing a subclass of the dialog factory to the @B_android#support#v7#app#MediaRouteButton_E@ using the @B_android#support#v7#app#MediaRouteButton#setDialogFactory_E@ method.
